thought: To craft a lime_terracotta, I need to first craft a lime_dye, which can be obtained by smelting a sea_pickle. I will smelt the sea_pickle from slot 16 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 16 to slot 11 with quantity 1
